original: Erlandson, Sigurd Tobias, rektor. Valdemarsvik, f. 20/5/91 i Jönköp. av överlär. Måns E. o. Maria Stoore. G. 22 m. Ruth Blomqvist. Barn: Ulf f. 25, Sten 28. — Stud:ex. i Jönköp. 10, fil. mag. i Lund 14, provår 22. Stud:-res. t. T,vskl. 21 o. 39, Engl. 36. Vik. ämneslär. kort. tid. v. Jönköp. h. folk-sk. o. Ö. Grevie folkhögsk. 16, vik. adj. i Strömstad, vik. lektor i Ystad, vik. adj. i Halmstad kort. tid. vt 17, ämneslär. i Sollefteå 17-19, ord. ämneslär. samt rektor v. Valdemarsviks h. foilksk. 19-21, rektor v. VaWemars-vik’S komm. mellansk. 22-24, adj. i tyska o. eng. samt rektor v. samreal-sk. fr. 44, rektor f. yrkes’sk. där 40-45. Kontr vstyr. omb. o. ordf. i s-tyr. f. System A-B 30-38, led. av köpingsnd o. köpingsfullm. RVO 43.
translated: Erlandson, Sigurd Tobias, principal. Born in Valdemarsvik on May 20, 1891, in Jönköping, to the senior teacher Måns E. and Maria Stoore. Married Ruth Blomqvist in 1922. They have two children: Ulf, born in 1925, and Sten, born in 1928. He completed his high school education in Jönköping in 1910. In 1914, he obtained a Master's degree from Lund University and completed his internship in 1922. He went on study trips to Germany in 1921 and 1939 and to England in 1936. He worked as a substitute subject teacher for a short time at Jönköping primary school and Ö. Grevie folk high school in 1916 and as a substitute teacher at Strömstad, Ystad, and Halmstad for a short time in the spring of 1917. From 1917 to 1919, he worked as a subject teacher in Sollefteå. He was an ordinary subject teacher and principal of Valdemarsvik's primary school from 1919 to 1921 and principal of Valdemarsvik's municipal intermediate school from 1922 to 1924. He was a German and English substitute teacher and principal of the same high school from 1944 and principal of the vocational school there from 1940 to 1945. He was a contracting state commissioner and chairman of the South System AB from 1930 to 1938. He was a member of the town council and town councilor RVO in 1943.
